sentences.en: A year on, their problems seem humdrum, not horrific.
sentences.cn: 一年过去, 它们的问题似乎平淡无奇, 一点也不可怕.

sentences.en: Although the offences were horrific it was to her credit that she had owned up.
sentences.cn: 她的犯罪手段很残忍，但她的供认不讳还是可以认可的。

sentences.en: As you can see, we have three horrific gunshot wounds.
sentences.cn: 你可以看到, 这由3个可怕的枪伤.

sentences.en: Before we had our child the idea of staying in every night would have been horrific.
sentences.cn: 在有孩子前，我们认为每天晚上呆在家里的想法是很可怕的。

sentences.en: Formerly stable credit funds are mark - to - market are posting horrific numbers.
sentences.cn: 之前稳定的按市场计价的信贷基金正报出可怕的数字.

sentences.en: He endured horrific torture, but he is finally free.
sentences.cn: 他忍受了可怕的折磨, 但最终获得自由.

sentences.en: He stiffened ( with terror ) at the horrific sight.
sentences.cn: 他看到那恐怖的情景吓呆了.

sentences.en: Sinkholes, sinkholes , sinkholes in China lately, and they horrific - large, deep, and sudden.
sentences.cn: 最近中国出现了诸多天坑, 它们令人恐惧 ---- 大, 深, 出现得很突然.

sentences.en: The annual slaughter of wildlife in Italy is horrific.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，每年大量捕杀野生动物的现象令人震惊。

sentences.en: The blood in my veins curdled at the horrific sight.
sentences.cn: 看到这一可怕情景时,我血管中的血似乎凝固了.

sentences.en: The film showed the most horrific murder scenes.
sentences.cn: 那部影片有极恐怖的谋杀场面.

sentences.en: The real picture is more horrific and stronger but one must conjure up all the associative thoughts and emotions it evokes.
sentences.cn: 真实的画面更恐怖也更震撼，但是它带来的种种感受和情绪需要你自己去联想。

sentences.en: There were several lessons to be learned after the horrific events.
sentences.cn: 这些令人恐惧的事件结束之后,有许多教训值得汲取.

sentences.en: This last horrific thing happened only a few weeks ago.
sentences.cn: 而仅仅在几个星期以前,又发生了一件令人恐怖的事情.
